item.title: Join us in support of Sexual Violence Awareness Week
item.description: From Monday 2 to Friday 6 February, we have a range of events lined up to support your sexual health and relationships.

item.title: Join NTU in marking Race Equality Week: because #ChangeNeedsAllOfUs
item.description: Find out how you can get involved in the five-day learning challenge which encourages us to reflect on how our actions can influence the learning environment around us.

item.title: Nottingham Trent Students’ Union – Student-Led Teaching Awards 2026
item.description: Has a staff member you know gone above and beyond for you or your course mates? If so, then you can nominate them for a Nottingham Trent Students’ Union (NTSU) Student-Led Teaching Award.

item.title: Join our Apprenticeships Open Day
item.description: Discover how an apprenticeship can open the door to an exciting career. Learn more about life as an apprentice, chat with employers and find out about the different apprenticeship courses at NTU.

item.title: Back for Term Two – unlock your potential with our free Pathways to Progress workshops
item.description: Get your 2026 off to a great start by focusing on your personal development.

item.title: Places available for the Robin Hood Half and Mini Marathon 2026 – join Team NTU!
item.description: This September, join students, staff and supporters from across NTU and take part in the Robin Hood Half or Mini Marathon to support the work of the John van Geest Cancer Research Centre.

item.title: Review NTU for the chance to win hundreds of pounds worth of prizes
item.description: Tell your #LoveNTU story for the chance to win great prizes and help future students choose where to study.

item.title: Your chance to win a brand new MacBook Air
item.description: We’ve partnered with Santander to give you the opportunity to win one of 10 brand-new MacBook Air laptops

item.title: Free and low-cost creative activities to try in January
item.description: January is the perfect time to try something new and there are plenty of free and low-cost opportunities to get involved in with over the next few weeks.

item.title: Come celebrate the new Clifton Global Lounge with us
item.description: We’re excited to announce the official opening of the new Clifton Global Lounge. Come along on Thursday 22 January to network with new friends and enjoy some global-themed crafts.
